text.$: - U.S. Appl. No. 12/594,361, filed Oct. 2, 2009Djupesland et al.
- U.S. Appl. No. 12/594,365, filed Oct. 2, 2009Djupesland et al.

p.$: The present invention relates to a nasal delivery device for and a method of delivering a substance, in particular one of a liquid, as a suspension or solution, or a powder containing a medicament, especially systemic or topical pharmaceuticals, or a vaccine to the nasal airway of a subject.
